original_title: Excise inspector, three officers arrested over shooting in Bambalapitiya
original_body_lines: An Excise Inspector and three Excise officers were arrested over the shooting incident reported in Bambalapitiya this evening.
A gang of unidentified gunmen who arrived in a van through a by-road had fired shots at a car near a fuel station on the Marine Drive at Bambalapitiya.
Police said both vehicles had fled the scene after the shooting and several empty bullet shells have been recovered from the scene.
